nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -18,22 +18,20 @@
         <analyzeTests>false</analyzeTests>
         %static-code-analysis-stop%
     </properties>
+    <repositories>
+        <repository>
+            <id>snapshots-repo</id>
+            <url>https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots</url>
+            <releases><enabled>false</enabled></releases>
+            <snapshots><enabled>true</enabled></snapshots>
+        </repository>
+    </repositories>
     <dependencies>
         <dependency>
             <!-- Comes with JUnit 5, AssertJ and Hamcrest. JUnit 4 (JUnit 5 Vintage) or jqwik need to be added explicitly -->
             <groupId>de.tum.in.ase</groupId>
             <artifactId>artemis-java-test-sandbox</artifactId>
-            <version>1.3.4</version>
-        </dependency>
-        <dependency>
-            <groupId>org.json</groupId>
-            <artifactId>json</artifactId>
-            <version>20190722</version>
-        </dependency>
-        <dependency>
-            <groupId>me.xdrop</groupId>
-            <artifactId>fuzzywuzzy</artifactId>
-            <version>1.2.0</version>
+            <version>1.3.5-SNAPSHOT</version> <!-- TODO: update to 1.3.4 when released -->

nodes.bodyText:
It would be a good idea to add the AJTS annotations here as well. (Can be the same as in the behavior)
We currently initialize the classes AFAIK.
The same holds for the other three.
This should then be replaced by strict timeout.
The same holds for the other three.
